argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | distgp.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | distgp.2 | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> J = { (/) , B } ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_indistopon | |- ( B e. _V -> { (/) , B } e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- { (/) , B } e. ( TopOn ` B ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2 | #P_istps | |- ( G e. TopSp <-> J e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> G e. TopSp ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` G ) |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_grpsubf | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( -g ` G ) : ( B X. B ) --> B ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( -g ` G ) : ( B X. B ) --> B ) |
| 15 | 6, 6 | #P_xpex | |- ( B X. B ) e. _V |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_elmap | |- ( ( -g ` G ) e. ( B ^m ( B X. B ) ) <-> ( -g ` G ) : ( B X. B ) --> B ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( -g ` G ) e. ( B ^m ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 18 | 4 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( ( J tX J ) Cn J ) = ( ( J tX J ) Cn { (/) , B } ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_txtopon | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` B ) /\ J e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) -> ( J tX J ) e. ( TopOn ` ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 9, 19 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( J tX J ) e. ( TopOn ` ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_cnindis | |- ( ( ( J tX J ) e. ( TopOn ` ( B X. B ) ) /\ B e. _V ) -> ( ( J tX J ) Cn { (/) , B } ) = ( B ^m ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 6, 21 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( ( J tX J ) Cn { (/) , B } ) = ( B ^m ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 22 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( ( J tX J ) Cn J ) = ( B ^m ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 24 | 17, 23 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> ( -g ` G ) e. ( ( J tX J ) Cn J ) ) |
| 25 | 2, 12 | #P_istgp2 | |- ( G e. TopGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. TopSp /\ ( -g ` G ) e. ( ( J tX J ) Cn J ) ) ) |
| 26 | 3, 11, 24, 25 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ J = { (/) , B } ) -> G e. TopGrp ) |
